verses.name: Mark 3:28
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men, and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme:

verses.name: Mark 3:29
verses.text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation:

verses.name: Mark 3:30
verses.text: Because they said, He hath an unclean spirit.

verses.name: Mark 3:31
verses.text: There came then his brethren and his mother, and, standing without, sent unto him, calling him.

verses.name: Mark 3:32
verses.text: And the multitude sat about him, and they said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee.

verses.name: Mark 3:33
verses.text: And he answered them, saying, Who is my mother, or my brethren?
